methods: static Set<Currency> getAvailableCurrencies() Returns a set of all known currencies.
String getCurrencyCode() Returns this currency's ISO 4217 currency code.
int getDefaultFractionDigits() Returns the default number of fraction digits for this currency.

String toString() Returns this currency's ISO 4217 currency code.
